titleStmt.title: The Christian soldier's penny Bible. Shewing, from the Holy Scriptures, the soldier's duty and encouragement. Being a brief collection of pertinent scriptures, under XX heads, fit for the soldier's, or seaman's pocket, when his is not furnish'd with, or cannot well carry a larger volume, in time of war.
Bible. English. Authorized. Selections. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Smith for Sam: Wade, under the piazza of the Royal Exchange in Cornhil, and sold by him and Rich. Baldwin near the Oxford Arms in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: With Biblical citations in marginal notes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
